alert.note: Alert for Boone County Except Southwest; Boone County Higher Elevations; Marion; Newton County Higher Elevations (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 11 at 4:54PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Marion and Boone Counties through 545 PM CDT... At 453 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Red Bank, or 10 miles west of Harrison, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Harrison... Diamond City... Bergman... Lead Hill... Pyatt... Valley Springs... Olvey... Myrtle... Red Bank... Winington... Clark Hill... Capps... Willis... Crawford... Bellefonte... Alpena... Everton... Zinc... South Lead Hill... Batavia... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Boone County Except Southwest; Boone County Higher Elevations; Marion; Newton County Higher Elevations
